news.title: ‘A step-change’: tech firms battle for undersea dominance with submarine drones
news.summary: Navies around the world are racing to add autonomous submarines. The UK’s Royal Navy is planning a fleet of underwater uncrewed vehicles (UUVs) Australia has committed to spending $1.7bn (£1.3bn) on ‘Ghost Shark’ submarines.

news.title: One in 10 UK parents say their child has been blackmailed online, NSPCC finds
news.summary: One in 10 UK parents say their child has been blackmailed online. Harms include threats to release intimate pictures. NSPCC warns against parents sharing photos or details of children online.

news.title: The best Black Friday 2025 deals in the UK on the products we love, from window vacs to sunrise alarms
news.summary: Black Friday has long since ceased to be a mere ‘day’ We’ve cut through the noise to find genuinely good discounts on Filter tried-and-tested products.

news.title: My family’s excitement about Outer Worlds 2 was short-lived | Dominik Diamond
news.summary: The original Outer Worlds dazzled our eyeballs with its art nouveau palette. It charmed our ears with witty dialogue, sucking us into a classic mystery-unravelling story. My wife did not play The Outer Worlds, because none of those worlds featured Crash Bandicoot.
